About me

I am Vietnamese and live in Tokyo/Japan.
My Vietnamese name is Lê Đức Tùng that is decoded as a dictionary of {last:Lê, middle:Đức, first:Tùng}.

Bio

January 2017 - Research Staff Member @ IBM Research - Tokyo
April 2016 - December 2017 Postdoctoral Researcher @ IBM Research - Tokyo
2007 - 2012 Researcher @ High Performance Computing Center, Hanoi University of Science and Technology

Education

2013 - 2016 Ph.D. @ SOKENDAI/National Institute of Informatics
2008 - 2010 M.Sc. @ Hanoi University of Science and Technology
2002 - 2007 B.S. @ Hanoi University of Science and Technology
